CustomField.description: This field is checked when a Cal Atlas user manually adds an Applied Accounting Code to a Liability Payment. These have to be reported to DIR Accounting separately to ensure they are recorded in CalSTARS.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box when you manually add an Applied Accounting Code to a Liability Payment, so that it can be reported to DIR Accounting separately to ensure they are recorded in CalSTARS.
CustomField.label: Added Manually
